refnamediv.refpurpose: Import a MASCARET state from a file

listitem.para: (Output argument) Error code value : zero indicates that no errors occurred
MASCARET instance number returned by the function createMASCARET
Name of the file with the initial solution (max 255 characters)
print (write) on the listing files (1-> True 0-> False)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Import a MASCARET state from a file.

This function initialise the MASCARET state from a file for an existing model. The file is created by the GUI software FUDAA-MASCARET with the action : « File | Export | Mascaret | File of initial water levels (Mascaret file format) » or with : « Hydraulics | Conditions Initiales | Initial conditions | Initial water level | Export »
Before using this function, it is necessary to import a MASCARET model with the function importModelMASCARET.

refsection.title: Example
